title: My account got hacked
body: My ign is Narwhal1 and my account got hacked. They changed my email username and password so now I cant change anything. I was still signed in on the website so I was able to make this thread from my account

replies.body: Your best bet for getting help with your account would be to hit us up through our [**account recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416). They'll be able to go over all your personal account info in that ticket, and should be able to get you back on the Rift!
They might just play on the Treeline and/or Abyss too ya know {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Communicate with Riot’s[ Account Recovery Centre](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416)

The primary category is already selected. Fill in the rest of information (as much as possible).

http://eune.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/riotkayle_banner.jpg?itok=ikhDcpBV
